description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Beef Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Jan Feb 2020,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the spiced beef, rub steak with stir-fry shots and marinate for 15 minutes.
Cook steak on a preheated chargrill pan or barbecue over medium-high heat for 4 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking. Slice.
To make the Vietnamese dressing, combine all the ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a screw-top jar. Shake well until sugar dissolves.
To make the slaw, combine cabbage, onion and half the carrot in a bowl. Add rocket, capsicum, parsley and remaining carrot to bowl with 1/4 cup dressing and toss to combine.
Add beef to bowl and serve with remaining dressing.
